review.title: “Great place to start career”
review.pros: Pros – Always ahead with new technology. Great leaders. Young people and lot of fun
review.cons: Cons – Not so good at spending money for employees in terms of salary or bonus.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Need to have competitive salary structure

review.title: “Not a good work experience”
review.pros: Pros – The peers I worked with were very nice and friendly. The owner of the company was very nice but clueless to how the CEO is running the company.
review.cons: Cons – Women are treated unfairly and have no room for advancement with in the company.Managagement treats lower level employees poorly.There were no procedures or processes within the company, including, no Human Resources department.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Stop hiring your friends and give people within the company opportunity to prove thier skills.
